docs.title: Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center
docs.text:
Multiple Campuses

BI Boston has two disconnected campuses. EMERGENCIES: Go to bidmc-west, Ambulance Bay on Pilgrim Road. East campus does not have an emergency room.

Both West Campus and East Campus have in-patient floors and both in-patient and out-patient services.
